Ben Leskey's Blog: deepdive deepdive posts from Ben Leskey https://benleskey.com/blog/tags/deepdive en-us 2023 Ben Leskey Wed, 29 Mar 2023 02:12:11 +0000 Wed, 29 Mar 2023 02:12:11 +0000
I took the ETS major field test for computer science Every senior student at MVNU takes a standardized assessment. The assessment lets MVNU administration compare how well their students are doing against other institutions, and how well each program is teaching the fundamentals of the program’s field. In my case the assessment was the ETS major field test for computer science. While I knew the test was coming up, I wasn’t given any information about what would be on the test, and since I knew it wouldn’t affect my graduation or GPA I wasn’t particularly concerned about studying for it. The day before the testing day I decided to look… deepdivesoftwareacademics https://benleskey.com/blog/cs_mft https://benleskey.com/blog/cs_mft Thu, 16 Mar 2023 12:00:00 +0000
Raymon Ortega #2: Battery Heist and a Sweet Chariot On foot Last we left Raymon, he had scrounged together some meagre gear and a sturdy spear and was about to hike north west toward the refugee center. Striking out across the field, Raymon headed toward the regional dump near the evac shelter. It wasn’t far as the crow flies, though not connected by road anywhere nearby. This is some form of otherworldly hound. Lean and hungry-looking, its twisted red flesh is stretched tightly across its misshapen, angular frame. Loping grotesquely along, its unusually long neck stretches forward, its skull-like head near the ground as it sniffs out its prey.… gamesletsplaycddacdda_raymon https://benleskey.com/blog/cdda_raymon_2 https://benleskey.com/blog/cdda_raymon_2 Tue, 31 Jan 2023 12:00:00 +0000 _
